/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the clear blue sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene.
